<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;PPC64LinuxTargetObjectFile::SelectSectionForGlobal(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> Kind, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here override ReadOnlySection to DataRelROSection for PPC64 SVR4 ABI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when we have a constant that contains global relocations.  This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// necessary because of this ABI&#39;s handling of pointers to functions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a shared library.  The address of a function is actually the address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of a function descriptor, which resides in the .opd section.  Generated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code uses the descriptor directly rather than going via the GOT as some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other ABIs do, which means that initialized function pointers must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reference the descriptor.  The linker must convert copy relocs of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointers to functions in shared libraries into dynamic relocations,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because of an ordering problem with initialization of copy relocs and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PLT entries.  The dynamic relocation will be initialized by the dynamic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// linker, so we must use DataRelROSection instead of ReadOnlySection.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For more information, see the description of ELIMINATE&#95;COPY&#95;RELOCS in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GNU ld.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1">Kind</a>.isReadOnly()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;GVar = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(GO);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GVar &amp;&amp; GVar-&gt;isConstant() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GVar-&gt;getInitializer()-&gt;needsDynamicRelocation())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1">Kind</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind/#a3d239dea51a80324a3ce44985ed41dd4">SectionKind::getReadOnlyWithRel</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfileelf/#a7c532f94d6bb9c4aba4190b81a7f8dbf">TargetLoweringObjectFileELF::SelectSectionForGlobal</a>(GO, Kind, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfile/#a4ef15b6d500629e31fb3787b7a0d7bb0">TM</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;PPC64LinuxTargetObjectFile::</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">getDebugThreadLocalSymbol(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Sym)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCExpr &#42;Expr =</span></CodeLine>
